_description: Cubicler Server Configuration Example - This file shows how to configure JWT authentication for Cubicler endpoints
_usage: 1. Copy this file to your desired location (e.g., ./cubicler.json)
2. Set the CUBICLER_CONFIG environment variable to point to your config file
3. Configure the required environment variables for JWT secrets

_environmentVariables._note: To disable JWT authentication completely, remove the auth sections. To disable JWT for specific endpoints, remove the endpoint from the endpoints section.
